              that
               
              he
               
              is
               
              become
               
              very
               
              hot
               
              and
               
              valiant
              .
              
              If
               
              I
               
              had
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              sons
              ,
               
              the
               
              first
               
              human
               
              principle
              
              I
               
              would
               
              teach
               
              them
               
              should
               
              be
               
              to
               
              forswear
              
              thin
               
              potations
               
              and
               
              to
               
              addict
               
              themselves
               
              to
               
              sack
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              Bardolph
              ?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text:
The
               
              army
               
              is
               
              discharged
               
              all
               
              and
               
              gone
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Let
               
              them
               
              go
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              through
               
              Gloucestershire
              ,
              
              and
               
              there
               
              will
               
              I
               
              visit
               
              Master
               
              Robert
               
              Shallow
              ,
              
              Esquire
              .
               
              I
               
              have
               
              him
               
              already
               
              temp’ring
               
              between
               
              my
              
              finger
               
              and
               
              my
               
              thumb
              ,
               
              and
               
              shortly
               
              will
               
              I
               
              seal
               
              with
              
              him
              .
               
              Come
               
              away
              .
